body:
Hello.

The name's Hornet. Many of you may have heard of me through McZone, due to my demotion from staff on that server in the past. There was a little confusion as to who my "previous" account was. However that account was given away, and is now compromised. Considering my old account was banned, I asked ever so politely to be unbanned, however I was told I needed to come back on a new account. I changed the name of the compromised account. And now,

I'm back.
